MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G67, ML5 and ML6 postcode areas of Glasgow, Coatbridge and Airdrie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am to complete repairs on faulty equipment in Gartsherrie and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:40am on Thursday, 25 March 2021
